Control Name: SC-22 ARCHITECTURE AND PROVISIONING FOR NAME / ADDRESS RESOLUTION SERVICE
Control Statement: The information systems that collectively provide name/address resolution service for an organization are fault-tolerant and implement internal/external role separation.

control_attributes.Control Name: SC-22 ARCHITECTURE AND PROVISIONING FOR NAME / ADDRESS RESOLUTION SERVICE
control_attributes.Control Statement: The information systems that collectively provide name/address resolution service for an organization are fault-tolerant and implement internal/external role separation.
